A scientist is working on a project to harness the power of the sun. One day, an unexpected event occurs, and the sun disappears from the sky. The scientist and his team must figure out what happened and how to bring the sun back before it's too late.

A young child wakes up one morning to find that the sun is not in the sky. As the day progresses, they realize that the world is changing, and they must find a way to bring the sun back before it's too late.

A group of astronauts are on a mission to explore a new planet. As they land, they realize that the sun is not rising, and they must find a way to fix it before they are trapped on the planet forever.
A family is on vacation at a beach resort. One morning, they wake up to find that the sun is not in the sky. They must find a way to bring the sun back before they are stuck at the resort forever.

A group of people are on a boat trip in the middle of the ocean. One morning, they wake up to find that the sun is not in the sky. They must find a way to bring the sun back before they are stranded in the middle of the ocean.
